website_summaries.verdict: A small, reliable, brushed-metal switch for shop, shed, trailer, RV. Not as attractive as traditional designs.
pros: Easy to locate in low light
Installation is fairly simple and versatile
cons: Fit issues if installing in RVs
May not hold up in outdoor environments

customer_reviews.title: Great looking 12 volt switch!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very straight forward! The switch came with the 2 plastic connectors to crimp on my 12 volt wiring and then they just slide onto the posts on the back of the switch. I used it to be able to turn my 12 volt water pump off and on in my rv.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured in listing.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars if the product was what is pictured. I received I/O instead of on and off markings. I had to explain what was on and off to my 9 year old which took a little bit, wish it was plain on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Turns things on and off
customer_reviews.text: As someone else noted, the picture is wrong. It doesn't say "ON" and "OFF" on it. That would be nice, but it doesn't. It has the symbols for on and off, which no one knows what they mean. This means that occasionally I have to flip the switch to see if my water pump is on or off. But honestly, that's not that big of a deal. Other than that minor detail, this switch was perfect, and exactly what I needed. I've been using for 5 or so months, and have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mark Rodin

customer_reviews.title: Need to update product photo!
customer_reviews.text: Product Photo does not indicate accurate switch, hope this helps. Otherwise the switch is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy Little Switch for Various Projects
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular switch mainly due to the price but have found it well exceeds my expectations in terms of ease of installation and robustness for the price I paid. I am using the switch for 12 volt LED light strips in a duck blind. It fits the bill perfectly. The back side can accept straight or 90* flag terminal receptacles. The red (18-20ga wire) fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for My Solar Controller Board Project
customer_reviews.text: Using 4 of these switches on my Solar Controller Board for turning lights and fans on and off. My most demanding circuit can draw up to 7 amps, and this switch easily handles this current. I’m using 3 of these in conjunction with 12 volt timers to automate switching, and 1 with a thermostat controller. The switches could be a little tighter fit in the chrome mounting bezel, but once the switches are mounted there are no problems with them coming out. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Video

customer_reviews.title: Not Labeled On/Off
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for picture not of product. I should have checked the reviews. The black trim isn't labeled on/off the switch has I/O like a Computer (power present / not present). So skip this if its for your RV it looks stupid.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREC

customer_reviews.title: Switch works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works very good! Keep in mind this is for a single wire. So in my need I had positive and negative wires from the battery, I put this switch inline on the positive feed to my led lights in my enclosed trailer. I coated then coated the wires on the back and the terminals (what was left showing) in liquid tape. These will accept female wire termination connections.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Switch for 12 volt shed lights
customer_reviews.text: I mounted 2 of these switches on an old board and wired my 12 volt led lights to them. They work like a charm. I am very happy with how easy they are to use. I was a bit disappointed that they don't say on or off like the picture, but it is obvious if the lights are off hit the switch to turn the lights on... lol They are a nice sturdy switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but flimsy mounting plate
customer_reviews.text: The switch works but the mounting faceplate is thin as can be very flimsy, knowing that you just need to make sure you are mounting it on a real good sturdy base structure. It has been working great for months now so the functioning is good, so giving 4 stars due to the flimsy mounting face plate.
customer_reviews.author: Biggie's Equipment

customer_reviews.title: Rocker switch to the rescue
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet but may use as a replacement in rv. Originally was going to use with led lights in shed. Since I'm using the led lights as replacements in rv. May update later unsure.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Verrett

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely flawless!! They are extremely high end looking and feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Much small than I imagined but I actually like it much more than what I was picturing size wise. They are absolutely flawless and great looking. Well worth the money. Absolutely does NOT feel cheap. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice 12 volt switch.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice 12 volt switch. I use this for an outside shower to turn on a 12 volt water pump and it works fine. Sorry to say I have to revise my review: The switch would quit working, we would clean it with electromotive parts cleaner and it would work again for a week or so then quit again. I would not buy it again. {In all fairness this switch was used outside but not exposed to water. Dust and the outdoor environment may have done it in} We only got to use it for a month or so during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Flys4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have it
customer_reviews.text: This switch meets my need. I installed it in my enclosed cargo trailer. Does exactly what it was designed to do. Turn on and off my recently installed lights.
customer_reviews.author: Abidehandy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used these with an LED light string. I used terminal lugs, but they can be soldered too easily. My only concern will be longevity. There are holes in it, presumably to to let it dry if moisture got in, so we will see how it holds up over time...
customer_reviews.author: Tinker-Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good but don't solder
customer_reviews.text: Use spade connectors don't solder. The plastic has a low melting point. I trashed mine and had to go to a auto parts store and get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice switch assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice switch assembly. Used this to control DC power to my LPG gas/carbon monoxide monitor inside my RV. Nice chrome mounting, however the the switch is not marked with ON/OFF but the I/O symbol. Not a concern for me. Installed very nicely and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbi

customer_reviews.title: says I/O not ON/OFF
customer_reviews.text: minor annoyance: the photo is inaccurate. other than that, it's a switch on an aluminum plate.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: great switch for my van light
customer_reviews.text: got a extra box for it and attached to my new led light string for the work van. great quality and works. what else can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: never again shop retail

customer_reviews.title: Great Switch!
customer_reviews.text: Great little switch! I will be buying a few more of them for a couple projects.
customer_reviews.author: DJAPLUSHAITI

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought the switch for a replacement switch on my airstream motorhome works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: light switch
customer_reviews.text: I used his switch in my shed to connect lights to a battery. Worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: nc shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Switch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for some 12 volt lights for my boat. It looks Great And Works Perfect!! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TOMMY G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product 👌👍 ✌️ 😊😁
customer_reviews.text: Great little on and off switch. It's for my solar lights for when the power goes off. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Davis

customer_reviews.title: Really nice touch...
customer_reviews.text: This is a classy little switch for situations where you don't want cockpit looking switches. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David L Russell

customer_reviews.title: Nice bezel plate
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with a backlight when switch is on, but it fit perfectly where I needed it. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Nice switch!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems with the switch working. Plus it looks very nice with the mount!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good switch
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in the back of my work van. I used a wire mold box. The switch was perfect! The Stainless cover supplied was not big enough to use on the box. No surprise as its intended to go on your dash or a panel. I retrofited a regular blank cover to fit my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Brendaddy

customer_reviews.title: It's a switch
customer_reviews.text: Works great. For the noobs who complained about the fact that it only has a circle and a line on it, it's a DC switch. Look at just about any electronic device you have and the switch will be the same. The line represents a closed circuit (on). The circle represents an open circuit (off).
customer_reviews.author: wantdd214

customer_reviews.title: Great value Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Fixed a broken switch on a trailer fast and easy
customer_reviews.author: GlennT

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The switch in the picture shows “On and Off” the one I got does not. It has a line and a circle to indicate position. And had crushed packaging...Not what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Porter

customer_reviews.title: It Only Worked A Week
customer_reviews.text: This switch was cheaply made apparently. It worked great for one week and then refused to work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dgreer1986

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice switch for the price. Looks at home in my Airstream trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Dave

customer_reviews.title: Switch plate
customer_reviews.text: Just a standard RV switch on a piece of stainless. Corners are sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly in my 5th Wheel trailer
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace a switch in my 5th wheel trailer that was faulty. This switch is sturdier and looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed in my RV
customer_reviews.text: Dd not show "on, off" as picture indicates but used the universal O I symbols. Works fine. No Problems!
customer_reviews.author: compukirby

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice if it came with screws. But in the end it works.
customer_reviews.author: shawn920

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Way to thin not of good material bent way to easy when mounted
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Labeled wrong
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it four stars total if it was labeled like the picture. I was looking for more of the straight forward on/off vs I/O. Gets the job done, pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: It's a switch. I'm using it to power a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a switch. I'm using it to power a 12v ceiling fan in my shed. Works well for that purpose. When I power on the fan using this switch, a half second passes and bearly audible click is heard from the switch and then the fan gets powered.
customer_reviews.author: William E Allen

customer_reviews.title: Junk switch
customer_reviews.text: This switch has been in my motorcycle trailer for about 14 months and used bout 5 times and wired to a 12v led rv light and already don’t work. Unhooked the wires touched them together and light works fine. Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Heather Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase as you can get the same switch at the hardware store for less.
customer_reviews.text: This is not what is shown in the picture. Wanted a flush mount 12 volt switch. Mine is stamped I & O not on & off and the prongs stick way out the back making it worthless to install as a flush mount switch. Not sending back as not worth my time..
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Although I would note that the chrome plate is easily scratched/stained.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described by the seller. No complaints. Although I would note that the chrome plate is easily scratched/stained.
customer_reviews.author: Yev Zakharov

customer_reviews.title: good switch and plate just smaller that it looks.
customer_reviews.text: a small plate and switch. It is not large like you thing it looks. Would work great given the proper place to use.
customer_reviews.author: gigal

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent switch, only thing is it didn't come with screws.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust Farms

customer_reviews.title: low price great value
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our Skoolie or bus covered into an rv. It was easy to install and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Red Castaway

customer_reviews.title: not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: the switch does not come with the words on / off it has a 1 / 0 which most people don't understand what it means. how hard is it to put up the right picture ?
customer_reviews.author: john meador

customer_reviews.title: Great for solar projects.
customer_reviews.text: I built wall light boxes, with frosted glass 'bottoms', using LED strips, powered off of solar. These switches were perfect to mount on the end of the light boxes. Great for 12v solar projects. I have ordered to twice (multiple switches per order).
customer_reviews.author: Grizz

customer_reviews.title: Roughly 2”w x 4”L  Simple on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: This is a small automotive on/off switch. Perfect size for a light switch I installed inside my enclosed trailer. 2 terminals for constant power and other wire to go directly to the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks good where I mounted it. I guess that's all you can want in a switch.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: JUST WHAT I NEEDED TO USE IN A TRAILER I'M BUILDING AS A TOOL& PARTS TRAILER
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wade

customer_reviews.title: used in shed
customer_reviews.text: ran 2 led lights behind this 12v switch - works good
customer_reviews.author: delbert cook

customer_reviews.title: but looks good, and is easier to use in the dark
customer_reviews.text: I used this switch with an 8 AA battery pack to install a 16' LED light strip in the back of a pickup truck. This switch wasn't necessary, but looks good, and is easier to use in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Great running joke in our relationship
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a joke for my boyfriend to turn his feelings on and off. Great running joke in our relationship.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality so far. Used to switch lights on and off in enclosed trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good construction
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Used for new lighting in our high school band trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: The switch arrived quickly and was easy to install. I was able to slide on the connectors and didn't need any special wiring, pigtails, or tape.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Purchase for toy hauler as a main off switch for entertainment system.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to control tv, stereo, and an android box and hard drive all runing from a small inverter.
customer_reviews.author: Firechachi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit to add additional lights on my tractor. Does not stick out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine in box truck cargo
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to a rail in the back of box truck for LED strip lights. Works great, thick metal plate, sturdy feeling switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Long

customer_reviews.title: Great switch
customer_reviews.text: Exactly why I needed. Perfect for my LED 12v trailer strip lights.
customer_reviews.author: Benedict Oliveri

customer_reviews.title: Great 12v switch
customer_reviews.text: great switch, used it for RV storage area for lights. Used this to install some LED license plate lights for the lower cargo area of the trailer, very sturdy construction and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Good in Barn
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Seems to work good right now. I am using it in my barn to turn on the 12 volt lights I have installed.
customer_reviews.author: backpack1953

customer_reviews.title: The size is just fine.
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what l wanted. It was difficult for me to visualize the actual size when ordering but that was my problem not the seller. The size is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: toolman

customer_reviews.title: Great for RV's and Cargo trailers!
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement to the cheap plastic switch I had. This switch has a great feel when switching from off to on. The polished steel bezel looks great as well. I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ACTUAL SWITCH DOES SAY "ON OR OFF"!!! (I retured it twice to know avail!!!)

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo
customer_reviews.text: Photo shows switch with the words on/off printed on it. The switches I received don't say anything.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy 12v Switch
customer_reviews.text: These switches are very sturdy, and should last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Nice in-expensive low voltage switch
customer_reviews.text: Nice switch. I used this with the Audew 40 led white lights.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great with 12v LED strip lights and a 12v fan ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with 12v LED strip lights and a 12v fan attached to an evaporative cooler. No instructions but not difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Casse

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Perfect replacement fit.
customer_reviews.text: Works as a perfect fit for my freedom brand trailer
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Cheap Switch
customer_reviews.text: Nice, cheap switch to replace a busted one in my camper. Does the job of turning the overhead light on and off nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Neat switch
customer_reviews.text: Switch looks nice where I placed it. It will operate a small electric blower I installed on my rider mower to help keep things cool back there. It only required a 1 1/4 x 1/2" cut out which I did with my dremel tool. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Old Tech

customer_reviews.title: but would be better if standard size for electrical outlet
customer_reviews.text: usable as is, but would be better if standard size for electrical outlet box

customer_reviews.title: They work great however I'm taking a star off because the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these that I put in my camper. They work great however I'm taking a star off because the picture shoes on/off, when it doesn't not actually say on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Steveo2626

customer_reviews.title: Very good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I would use a relay for anything over say 5amp draw. Not water proof so keep covered.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Use with 12v LED light
customer_reviews.text: I use this, a Lighting EVER 1 watt LED recessed light and a Rayovac 926 12v battery for a nice reading light in the cabin bunk. No need to run the generator or motor just to read by. :-)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking switch.
customer_reviews.text: While I can't yet comment about longevity, the quality of the fit and finish is excellent. The two male spade terminals make connection very easy and convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple rocker switch, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Used this with DC water pump in my small camper. Works great, easy to hook up, instructions included. Simple on/off, exactly what I wanted, and super fast shipping!

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, nice finish

customer_reviews.title: It's a switch, it did what it needed to do

product_meta.title: Prime Products 11-0190 Rocker Switch with 1 5/8″ x 2 5/8" Chrome Plate
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Two Position "Off-On" 12 volt rocker switch mounted on a 1-5/8" x 2-5/8" chrome plate. Great for remote switching of lights , water pumps, etc.
feature_bullets: Great for remote switching of lights , water pumps, etc.
Rocker switch mounted on a 1 5/8″ x 2 5/8″ polished metal plate. 15A 125V .
Do not exceed 10 amps if using on 12 volt. O – off / | – on.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars531 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
